alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 10:59PM CDT until March 29 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL OSAGE COUNTY... At 1057 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Dexter to 2 miles south of Hardy to 4 miles north of Kaw Lake, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Shidler... Grainola... Foraker... Webb City... At 10:55 PM...the Newkirk Oklahoma Mesonet reported a 67 mph wind gust from the line of storms. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
